ComicInfo.Title: The Crematorium
ComicInfo.Series: Will Eisner's the Spirit: The Corpse Makers
ComicInfo.Summary:
Danny Colt’s investigation leads him into a place of fears and horrors where he will learn that not all that is dead is dead. Don’t dare miss this third spine-tingling chapter of Francesco Francavilla’s tale of THE SPIRIT!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Francesco Francavilla | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Francesco Francavilla | 2 |
